plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water and sunshine to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees love to visit me.
🌞 I grow outside in the garden.
💧 I need to be watered.

plant.question: I am tall and have a woody trunk and branches with leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🌳 I'm much bigger than a flower.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and you can eat me! Rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🥗 You can eat me raw in a salad.
🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack.

plant.question: I'm small and green and cover the ground. Sometimes you walk on me, and it tickles your feet. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ People play games on me.
🐄 Cows like to eat me.
✂️ You need to cut me to keep me short.

plant.question: I have pointy needles instead of leaves and I stay green all year round. People decorate me for Christmas! What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of tree.
🎁 You put presents under me.
🌟 I smell like pine.

plant.question: I'm a fruit that grows on a vine. I can be green, red, or purple, and I'm used to make juice and jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can eat me as a snack.
🍷 Some grown-ups use me to make wine.
↕️ I grow in bunches.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated, and people love to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a tall plant.
🍿 You can add butter and salt to me.
🔥 I need heat to become fluffy.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and a green leafy top. You can slice me up and put me on a sandwich. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water.
🏖️ You might eat me in the summer.
🌱 I grow close to the ground.

plant.question: I am a vine that can climb up walls and trees. Sometimes I have thorns, and I am known for my beautiful fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me as a gift.
🥀 I can be red, pink, yellow, or white.
💘 I am a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a plant with a prickly skin and sweet yellow flesh inside. I grow in warm, sunny places and have a crown on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tropical plant.
🍍 I have a very tough skin.
🍕 Some people put me on pizza!

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am very large!
🥜 I use my nose to pick up food.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I have whiskers.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🥛 I like to drink milk.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm a good friend to have. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am very tall.
🌿 I live in Africa.
🟫 I have brown spots.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat vegetables from the garden.
🐾 I have strong back legs.
🐇 I can be a pet or live in the wild.

animal.question: I waddle and quack. I like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I lay eggs.
🩱 I like to swim.
🌾 I eat seeds and insects.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a cat but very big.
🍖 I eat meat.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I have a long tail.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I like to peel fruit.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.
🐭 Some types of me eat mice.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
💦 I can change colors to blend in.
🦑 I use ink to hide.
